methods.text: Creates a blank new set of options ready for configuration.

methods.code: pub fn read(&mut self, read: bool) -> &mut OpenOptions
methods.text: Sets the option for read access.

methods.code: pub fn write(&mut self, write: bool) -> &mut OpenOptions
methods.text: Sets the option for write access.

methods.code: pub fn append(&mut self, append: bool) -> &mut OpenOptions
methods.text: Sets the option for the append mode.

methods.code: pub fn truncate(&mut self, truncate: bool) -> &mut OpenOptions
methods.text: Sets the option for truncating a previous file.

methods.code: pub fn create(&mut self, create: bool) -> &mut OpenOptions
methods.text: Sets the option for creating a new file.

methods.code: pub fn create_new(&mut self, create_new: bool) -> &mut OpenOptions
methods.text: Sets the option to always create a new file.

methods.code: pub async fn open(&self, path: impl AsRef<Path>) -> Result<File>
methods.text: Opens a file at path with the options specified by self.
